name: Drag n Hoard
description:
[CONTROLS]

-W D to Move left and right.

-Space to jump.

-E to use Vents and Chests

-Q to drop gems.

-Escape to quit.

-Shift to restart when you die.

-It has basic controller support too.

[HINT]

You can only carry so much, throw gems down to lighten your load. (They don't disappear).

[ABOUT]

The more gems you carry the lower your jump height and slower you move. That's our interpretation of "The more you have, the worse it gets".
Get a bunch of gems to the start zone and complete the game!
